waffleoRai_cafebotCommands

Class BotScheduler.Shift

  • java.lang.Object
    • waffleoRai_cafebotCommands.BotScheduler.Shift
  • Enclosing class:
    BotScheduler

    public static class BotScheduler.Shift
extends java.lang.Object
    A class containing information for a single shift. Command strings are mapped to bot index numbers, and bot index numbers are mapped to Positions.
    Since:
    July 1, 2018
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Blythe Hospelhorn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shift()
      Construct an empty Shift.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shift

        public Shift()
        Construct an empty Shift.

    • Method Detail

      • getBot

        public int getBot(java.lang.String cmd)
        Get the index of the bot set to handle a command defined by the string cmd during this shift.
        Parameters:
        cmd - String representation of command to retrieve the index of the handling bot for.
        Returns:
        The index of the bot that should be handling the given command during this shift. -1 if no such bot has been mapped to the given command string.

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(java.lang.String cmd,
                       int botIndex)
        Map a bot index to a command string. This will be treated as the index of the bot that will handle the command correlating to the given string during this shift.
        Parameters:
        cmd - The string representation of the command to set bot index for.
        botIndex - Index of bot to set as the handling bot for the given command during this shift.

      • addPosition

        public void addPosition(BotScheduler.Position p,
                        int botIndex)
        Set a bot to a Position and all of the Position's commands.
        Parameters:
        p - Position to set bot for during this shift.
        botIndex - Index of bot to set in the given Position.

      • getBotPosition

        public BotScheduler.Position getBotPosition(int botIndex)
        Get the Position set for the bot with the given index during this shift.
        Parameters:
        botIndex - Index of bot to retrieve shift Position of.
        Returns:
        Position of specified bot during this shift, or null if the provided bot has not been assigned a position during this shift.

      • getAllPositions

        public java.util.Set<BotScheduler.Position> getAllPositions()
        Get all Positions that are available/in use during this shift.
        ! Note !: This method has potential for efficiency improvement.
        Returns:
        A HashSet containing all Position objects referenced by this Shift.

      • getBotAtPosition

        public int getBotAtPosition(int p)
        Get the index of the bot currently assigned to the Position with index p.
        ! Note !: This method has potential for efficiency improvement.
        Parameters:
        p - The index of the Position to retrieve the assigned bot of.
        Returns:
        The index of the bot assigned to Position p, or 0 if there is none.
